sentences.chinese: 制詔御史：「諸侯王或欲推私恩分子弟邑者，令各條上，朕且臨定其號名。」
sentences.literal: Imperial Edict to the Imperial Secretary: 'When nobles and kings wish to bestow private favor by dividing fiefs to younger brothers and sons, let each one memorialize separately. I will personally determine their titles and names.'

sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：盛哉，天子之德！
sentences.literal: The Grand Historian said: How flourishing is the virtue of the Son of Heaven!
When one person has good fortune, the whole empire relies on it.
Son of Prince Xian of Hejian

sentences.chinese: 二。五年正月壬子，侯劉明元年。
sentences.literal: Two. Fifth year, first month, renzi day: Marquis Liu Ming first year.

sentences.chinese: 二。三年，侯明坐謀反殺人，棄市，國除。
sentences.literal: Two. Third year: Marquis Ming convicted of plotting rebellion and murder, executed in market, state abolished.
Son of Prince Ding of Changsha

sentences.chinese: 一。六年七月乙巳，思侯劉蒼元年。
sentences.literal: One. Sixth year, seventh month, yisi day: Marquis Si Liu Cang first year.
Six. First year: Current Marquis Zi Dang first year.
Son of Prince Ding of Changsha

sentences.chinese: 一。六年七月乙巳，侯劉成元年。
sentences.literal: One. Sixth year, seventh month, yisi day: Marquis Liu Cheng first year.

sentences.chinese: 四。五年，侯成坐酎金，國除。
sentences.literal: Four. Fifth year: Marquis Cheng convicted of tribute gold deficiency, state abolished.
Son of Prince Ding of Changsha.

sentences.chinese: 一。六年七月乙巳，哀侯劉黨元年。
sentences.literal: One. Sixth year seventh month yi si, Marquis Ai Liu Dang first year.

sentences.chinese: 元年，哀侯黨薨，無後，國除。
sentences.literal: First year, Marquis Ai Dang died, no posterity, state abolished.
Son of Prince Ding of Changsha.

sentences.chinese: 一。六年七月乙巳，侯劉福元年。
sentences.literal: One. Sixth year seventh month yi si, Marquis Liu Fu first year.

sentences.chinese: 四。五年，侯福坐酎金，國除。
sentences.literal: Four. Fifth year, Marquis Fu convicted of tribute gold, state abolished.
Son of Prince An of Chu.

sentences.chinese: 一。六年後九月壬戌，侯劉成元年。
sentences.literal: One. Sixth year ninth month after ren xu, Marquis Liu Cheng first year.

sentences.chinese: 四。五年，侯成坐酎金，國除。
sentences.literal: Four. Fifth year, Marquis Cheng convicted of tribute gold, state abolished.
Son of Prince An of Chu.

sentences.chinese: 一。六年後九月壬戌，侯劉不審元年。
sentences.literal: One. Sixth year ninth month after ren xu, Marquis Liu Bu Shen first year.
Four. Two. Fifth year, Marquis Ba first year.
